Articles.Content:
Greetings, fellow Kerbonauts. New recruit reporting for duty.

I have a football helmet, shoulder pads and a whole bag of Cheetos.

Seriously.. I love this game. I have all the available mods (thank you to everyone). Looking forward to the updates.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
